Posts.Content: Hi everyone. Im a newbiee to this site so thought it say good evening. Quick brief history I got diagnosed with breast caner on 10th september ive had the lumpectomy and senital node biopsy then 2 weeks later had a full mastectomy and all lymph nodes removed. My cancer is grade 2 and i am HER2 + ER+. Ive started chemo on 16th Nov and im having "EC" due t not being able to have the "f" part of the chemo as i have sever crohns disease and very little small bowl remaining. I may be having radio therepy but i am having 12 months of hercepting, 5 years if hormone therepy, my left breast removed and my ovaries and tubes removed after treatment is finished. Going to a long old battle.Ohhh and im 34 years old and a single mum to a beautiful strong 8 year old princess xxxx
Posts.Title: newbiee
